alert.note: Alert for Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 10:41PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Taney and southeastern Stone Counties through 1130 PM CST... At 1041 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Branson West to near Indian Point to near Roberson Hollow. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Branson... Lake Taneycomo... Table Rock State Park... Table Rock Lake... Hollister... Silver Dollar City... Forsyth... Merriam Woods... Kissee Mills... Reeds Spring... Rockaway Beach... Bull Creek... Indian Point... Branson West... Taneyville... Table Rock... Kirbyville... Blue Eye... Powersite... Ridgedale... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
